branchCategory.name: IDFB, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for North America
branchCategory.description: <p>IDFB series refrigerated air dryers are cUL listed for use in North America.  These 60 Hz models have rated flows up to 459 SCFM (780 m&sup3;/hr [ANR]).</p>

breadCrumb.name: IDFB, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for North America

branchItem.name: IDFB*E, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature for North America
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDFB*E refrigerted air dryers are suitable for use in aftercooled systems with compressors up to ~100 hp (depending on dew point desired).&nbsp; These durable units have simple control systems and are easily serviced.</p>

branchItem.name: IDFB, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperture for North America
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDFB refrigerated air dryers feature improved ambient (113°F/45°C) and inlet (149°F/65°C) air temperatures as well as improved flow ratings over standard models.  With an improved auto drain and standard dust filter, these units will provide years of reliable service.</p>
